website_summaries.verdict: A versatile printing calculator with a number of features you would only expect in higher priced models.
pros: This heavy duty printing calculator prints up to 4.4 lines per second (in 2 colors) and has a large 12-digit display screen
It offers Cost, Sell, Margin functions, performs tax calculations, has an item counter, and provides a grand total
cons: This model is larger than may be expected, which is only a problem if you don't have the desk space

customer_reviews.title: Comically large at about 8.25" x 6" but great calculator
customer_reviews.text: I needed a calculator that allowed more than 8 digits for tax work and I really liked my current Casio calculator so I went with this one. When it arrived I actually laughed out loud because it was so comically large. In an office setting I may be a little embarrassed to use this around other people (due to it's size) but I work from home and it's a great calculator. It's about 8.25" x 6"
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: This 8 1/4" x 6 1/8" (inches) is a very large calculator. It does a great job and has several options others models don't.
customer_reviews.text: The calculator measures 8 1/4" x 6 1/8" which is very large. It does a great job and has several options others don't like Cut, 5/4 rounding, Floating point, and a decimal point switch with several options. I deducted one star because its size is not stated in the description and because some functions do not work as expected. For those reasons, be sure to keep the instructions. An example shows what I mean: If you want to add 5% of 100 to 100, you CANNOT key in 100 + 5 % because it gives 105.263. You have to key in 100 x. 5 % + which gives the correct answer of 105 calculated as 100 + .05*100
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Big but Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this calculator because I needed a decent size calculator to run calculations. I manage a business' finances and I'm dyslexic. So the big numbers and the buttons make my life a whole lot easier. It's very easy to use and easy to read. You'd get your money's worth if you like to use a big calculator in an office setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Hardy, well-built solid calculator for accountants
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a long-lasting hardy printing calculator for my accounting office. It took me a long time to find a quality made calculator. I have 14 of these in different offices and some go out to a client's office regularly. These can handle that. I have paid a whole lot more for other brands thinking cost would mean better quality but no.... As the old brands quit working I replace them with these. They really do last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Nice large print and keys
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I am elderly so the larger keys and print out on the calculator are very nice. This is the second Casio calculator I have had and the one I just replaced was 25 years old and still worked but had difficulty getting the paper to run through so it would print.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator, it is large enough to read and use, I love the large size, been looking for one this big and couldn't find one, was so glad I found this one and I don't think it is too big, just perfect!! Very pleased with it and would recommend it to anyone that has eye problems of reading small calculator's and purchase this one, you won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: sweetie8

customer_reviews.title: Buy New
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these used Like New from Amazon. However, it didn't work right and kept printing all kinds of numbers that I did not enter. Decided to buy new because I like this unit better than the other brands and had one before that lasted about 5 years. It is very quiet and fast, and the keyboard feel is really nice. I should also say that I'm a self-employed bookkeeper and have used Many calculators. This one is my favorite in 41 years using various brands/models.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not a true business calculator
customer_reviews.text: This does not tabulate values in "ten key" configuration. Unless you're selling teddy bears, this calculator is useless for accounting purposes. (5+ 1-) should result in a 4 being displayed, instead is displays 6, which means this is just another personal calculator branded as a business calc.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Mary

customer_reviews.title: My Best
customer_reviews.text: This is my best calculator. I have 5 calculators at my office. All of them is different models. This one if my best. Very big screen and sturdy. Highly recommended to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Allowed my 95 year old Grandma to balance her own checkbook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 95 year old grandma when her old calculator (some cheap tiny thing) died after I don't know how many years. And today, she was able to successfully balance her checkbook entirely on her own for the first time in more than two years. She was very pleased, and so are we!
customer_reviews.author: Pachelbel

customer_reviews.title: Best Large Numeral Calculator Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a large numeral calculator that you can easily see this is the one for you. Not only are the lcd numbers entered a great size but so are the keys. It is a large and substantial calculator that feels like it will last unlike the disposable skimpy ones I have gotten in the past.
customer_reviews.author: MISTY

customer_reviews.title: very coonvenient
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one - I use this little "jewel" in several places. Wonderful - I am a senior citizen and this is a deal...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine....a bit big but works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this calculator. BUT please note the measurements.....it is rather large. I did not pay much attention to the dimensions simply because it had the features I wanted. If I had known how big, I might have tried to find a little smaller one. However, I am pleased with its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Johnie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: My company uses these in the finance department. I had occasion to use one and immediately ordered one for my home to replace my 1990's Casio. This one is bigger, but comfortable and build like a tank. Like going from an old VW beetle to a modern luxury car.
customer_reviews.author: Captbob

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk calculator. I opted for this one because the printing calculators had such bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see the numbers
customer_reviews.text: This is a larger size which is great because the buttons are easy to see. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied product
customer_reviews.text: Screen and buttons are big. Numbers are easy to read. I only use the very basic functions not sure if other features are good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent calculator
customer_reviews.text: An excellent larger sturdy calculator. Easy to use and very stable. No wobble. Works well with low light also.
customer_reviews.author: EveryManJack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent display!!
customer_reviews.text: My fav!! Large display, very easy to see. Love the keys. Easy to clean too. Just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kavita Shah

customer_reviews.title: The only calculator I need
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of the old model of this calculator (DM-1200TM I believe), which seems to be discontinued. This new one looks better and works exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... But Huge
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this calculator to be so big. It's excellent. Does everything I need it to do, but it is rather big.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly_Angelle

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and read and at a great value price.would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Great Adding Machine
customer_reviews.text: My last adding machine just broke after 8 years of loyaly using it everyday - go figure. So I was thilled to find the same one availalbe, as the local stores do not carry this model anymore. It is quiet to use, the keys are easy to pull and the functions are user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Romancegal

customer_reviews.title: works great but a bit too big
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I like large numbers and keys feel fine. I add very fast and it seem to keep up, so the speed is OK for me but it literally took half of my 27" deep desk, but I guess all heavy-duty professional calculators are big like this. And I also wish it would come in a lighter color, not just black. I've been using Casio DL-220A (in cream) for over 20 years. Finally, the printing mechanism gave up. This one has a few more functions that I'm still learning but for what I need it now, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This is the BIG EASY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used for my hubby for his birthday. We're a little older and "bill paying/checking account balancing day" used to be filled with expletives from the aggravation of a smaller calculator. This is a joy AND it came in perfect condition in the original box, which was also in perfect condition. Seller was great too. Good price + received promptly = Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Marvell-Sellentin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice calculator, couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice calculator, couldn't be happier. Quieter than my old Casio that I had for many years and finally came to the end of it's working days.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I have used this calculator before and was so happy to find it on Amazon. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: So good, I had to purchase one for home too.
customer_reviews.text: I like the one at work so much, I had to buy one for home, too. It can keep up with how fast I add, which most can't. I like having a printed tape. Keep up the good work, Casio. Worth the money. Will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. J.

customer_reviews.title: It replaced his favorite calculator.
customer_reviews.text: The calculator was for my husband. He says it's quiet, the display is bright and the buttons are the right size. It works great and is a good looking machine.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Digits can't get bigger, if you can't see the numbers you really need glass.

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Fast, quiet, easy to use, easy to read the tape. What more could one want? I haven't changed the ink ribbon yet and hope that is easy. I'm very impressed with this calculator and hope we have many happy years together!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic calculator. Buttons and view screen are large enough I don't need my glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Casio laid an egg
customer_reviews.text: Typically, Casio has good products. This is not one of them. When pushing the numbers, many times it would not accept the "push" and the number you think you input was not input at all. Even tried the one finger, straight down approach and still did not work any better. To top it off, it quit working correctly 5 days after the return policy expired. It was not worth the effort to try for partial refund and paying for shipping. Purchased another brand instead and ate the $40.
customer_reviews.author: L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Value for money. My husband really like it for work.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion and was in perfect condition. Works great. IMO the best desktop calculator for the money, period!

customer_reviews.title: Casio Printing Calculator
customer_reviews.text: This calculator works great! It's like the one I use at work so it enables me to work at home with ease. I purchased this unit as 'Used', at a great discount, but it was actually in like-new condition. Such a deal! I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DaleD

customer_reviews.title: HAUNTED!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd unit I've purchased. Two out of three have been "haunted!" They do weird things, like start feeding paper when the power is OFF, or the numeric keys stop working. Amazon has sent me a replacement, which works fine, but now this new one does the same weird stuff. Would like a new one, but it's been just over 30 days since I received it. Update: I was shipped a replacement unit at no cost. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dick F.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased one, returned for defect, purchase another and it had the same defect
customer_reviews.text: The keys did not work at all on the first calculator I purchased, with exception of the power and the "Feed." So I returned it and purchased another and it had the same problem, but worked sometimes and then just wouldn't work at all...I had to pay $13.70 to return the first one for an exchange, waiting to see if I have to pay again to return the second defective calculator... :(
customer_reviews.author: y

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: This adding machine is worth more the that. Only thing I didn't like was that it didnt come with the color ribbons. Not sure if I missed that in the add or not. But I love that adding machine.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Being in the accounting/financial field you tend to get use to a certain configuration of a calculator. For the past 20 years I've worked with Casio calculators and if my employer doesn't supply it, I bring my own. So I guess my review is this; if you have used Sharp or another brand besides Casio, know that the key configuration on a Casio is different. It will save you some headaches knowing this.
customer_reviews.author: jramirez

product_meta.title: Casio DR-210TM Printing Calculator
product_meta.description:
Style:Printing Calculator

DR-210TM CASIO DESK-TOP PRINTING CALCULATOR DR-210TM
This heavy-duty calculator is engineered for all your business needs. This calculator is capable of producing 4.4 lines per second, for even the fastest calculation entry. With a large, 12-digit display that is 33 percent larger than comparable models, and a printer than seamlessly switched between black and red, the DR-210TM, makes quick work of even the most demanding equations.


EASIER TO USE – DESIGNED AND ENGINEERED FOR PERFORMANCE
 * Prints up to 4.4 lines per second
 * Two color (black and red) printing
 * Large 12-digit Digitron display
 * Cost/Sell/Margin
 * Tax Calculations
 * Item Counter
 * Grand Total
 * AC adaptor
 * Heavy-duty keys that do not fade or wear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars366 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
